_meanings:
The tenth and last 
incarnation of Viṣṇu in his capacity of
the destroyer of the wicked and
liberator of the world from its 
enemies; (Jayadeva, while referring
to the several {%avatāras%} of Viṣṇu,
thus refers to the last or {%Kalki%}
avatāra: --{#mlecCanivahaniDane kalayasi#} 

{#karavAlam DUmaketumiva kimapi karAlam . keSava#}
{#DftakalkiSarIraM jaya jagadISa hare ..#} <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls>
<ls n="Gīt.">10.</ls>)
